channel.title: 317 PI auto restarter and updater?
channel.description:
Can some 1 get me a pi auto restarter and updater( the thing that comes up were people chat and is in yellow and gives a countdown) thanks
sorry if wrong forum

item.title: 317 PI auto restarter and updater?
item.dc:creator: @trublue trublue
item.description:
@trublue wrote:

Umm…what he said…its a command, and after you Update it you gotta restart the server yourself…ALL servers should have it…and PI does have a command file…its called command.java…and download this http://uppit.com/dgb4uuirp6i4/AutoRestarter.rar
and put it by your Run.bat and Compilar and ect…and rename your run.bat to runserver otherwise it wont work…enjoy

Read full topic

item.title: 317 PI auto restarter and updater?
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

um if you added it and compiled and no errors then you log in and when you want to do a update on the server you do your update compile and ect no errors then you do ::update 30. The 30 is 30 seconds till all players are kicked and account are saved you can change the 30 to what ever you want but its by seconds after the time is up. You exit the run and run the server again.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 PI auto restarter and updater?
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("update")) {
			try{
				if(c.playerRights == 0 || c.playerRights == 5 || c.playerRights == 1){
		return;
		}
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
				PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a;
				PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
				PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
				PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
				} catch (Exception e){}
			}

its a update command lol but here
